sys_script_include.name: RelatedListData

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_dd6391a987f72290b3fb021a0cbb35a5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_cpszo_spoke.RelatedListData</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>RelatedListData</name><script><![CDATA[var RelatedListData = Class.create();
RelatedListData.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getRelatedData: function(number) {
        var result = {
            offers: [],
            reminders: [],
            notifications: [],
            integrationLogs: []
        };

        // Helper function to query a table
        function queryTable(tableName, numberField) {
            var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
            gr.addQuery(numberField, number);
            gr.query();
            var records = [];
            while (gr.next()) {
                records.push(gr.getDisplayValue()); // or use gr.getValues() for full data
            }
            return records;
        }

        result.offers = queryTable('x_cpszo_spoke_offer_tracker', 'number');
        result.reminders = queryTable('x_cpszo_spoke_reminder_log', 'number');
        result.notifications = queryTable('x_cpszo_spoke_notification_preview', 'number');
        result.integrationLogs = queryTable('x_cpszo_spoke_integration_log', 'number');

        return result;
    },

    type: 'RelatedListData'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-05 04:42:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>dd6391a987f72290b3fb021a0cbb35a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RelatedListData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Spoke" source="x_cpszo_spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Spoke">8a196a9187c7e61002fdeac73cbb35b9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dd6391a987f72290b3fb021a0cbb35a5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brijesh.banerjee</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-05 04:42:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
